messages.subject: OFF TOPIC:  Organic Restoration Act
messages.msgSnippet: Good Morning.... As if there isn t enough to be concerned about!!!  This is, I believe, very important!!  Please read this, and, if you are concerned, please
messages.messageBody:
Good Morning....
As if there isn't enough to be concerned about!!! This is, I believe, very
important!! Please read this, and, if you are concerned, please pass it on
to others!

Thanks,
Peace,
coyote

Coyotes Corner
Very Cool Stuff for the World
<www.coyotescorner.com>

>
> Hi,
>
> I was at Bread and Circus today, buying meat when they gave me a card on
the Organic Restoration Act. It seems that some of our government
representatives decided at the last minute to add a rider to the
Appropriation Bill that would allow livestock growers (Poultry, Beef -- This
means DAIRY too, Pork ....) to feed their animals 'conventional' feed and
still label and sell it as organic.
>
> Now as you know, it would be much cheaper to feed your livestock
'conventional' feed and sell it for top dollar as organic. This cannot be
allowed to happen.
>
> To find out more go to:
>
> www.wholefoodsmarket.com/takeaction/
>
> Write your Senator and Representative and make them repeal this bad piece
of legislation. They make writing easy with links from thier site right to
the Senate and House.
>
> Judy
>
